data.message: If this guy was black nobody would give a shit about any of his muzac. And you didn't have to graduate from Lincoln High School to know that.

replies.message: Shady knew his dimples would help
Lol.. dr.dre thought he was black b4 he met em

Dhodel Balmes Yeah he did. I hated Eminem when he first came out. Wrote him off immediately as just another Vanilla Ice punk. Thought everything off of Slim Shady LP sucked. I still do. Until I heard The Way I Am and the Fucker called me out Cuz I was one of those cocky caucasians who thought he was a wigger who tried to be black etc. etc. Gave that some bitch mad props for that then listened to the whole album. Been a fan ever since. Still don't like some of his shit but that's me with any musician.
I'd love his music whether he was black or white actually
Cecelia Smith. That's cool. But my post was all tongue in cheek silliness wordplay. Not intended to bring about a debate on race.
Aaaaaaaaaand there it is. Please. Explain to me how anything I said was racist? The original post were lyrics from his own damned song you ignorant fuck. Smh.
